alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 12:45PM MST until February 09 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. Northwest winds gusting 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 6 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel on Highway 14 through the Bighorn Mountains and in the Story area will be impacted by snow showers, blowing snow, locally poor visibility and strong crosswinds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
